testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that KEYWORD field functionality works properly #1: {keyword=ADELE}

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When search events by keyword {ADELE} on Event Discovery Widget page
Then found events contains {ADELE} on Event Discovery Widget page
Check that found events contains text: ADELE

testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that KEYWORD field functionality works properly #2: {keyword=STING}

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When search events by keyword {STING} on Event Discovery Widget page
Then found events contains {STING} on Event Discovery Widget page
Check that found events contains text: STING

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites
